title: PC sales are down due to cost of living crisis but this is good for gamers
description: According to a new report, PC sales have sharply declined since last year, which could stand to benefit gamers in a big way.

title: Blu-ray discs won’t last forever, but this new beast of a 4K Blu-ray player might
description: The new Magnetar UDP900 is a high-priced option for Blu-ray disc fans, but with build quality this rugged, it will likely be the last player you ever buy.

title: Leaked Nvidia RTX 4070 may show the mid-range GPU option we've been waiting for
description: Leaked images may have revealed the Nvidia RTX 4070's design, as well as pricing that could make it the mid-range option gamers have been waiting for.

title: Ampere's new workstation could bring in a whole new dawn for developers
description: Ampere Altra dev kits or pre-assembled dev platforms are now available to buy, with some minor delays.

title: Apple's M3 Chip might get a huge upgrade, and it's just what Apple needs right now
description: Apple's next-gen chip might use TSMC's 3NE instead of N3 process.

title: Public charge stations are a danger to your security
description: The FBI just reiterated a long-standing warning about public charge stations and your phone's security

title: A shocking number of phone calls are just spam
description: Spam and fraud calls are costing both businesses and consumers time and money.

title: AI can crack most password in less than a minute
description: Researchers suggest creating passwords with 15 characters.

title: Windows 11 might be getting a feature that macOS has had for ages
description: Windows 11 will soon let you force quit from the taskbar, like macOS, and it’s about time.

title: Microsoft is bringing its AI Copilot to OneNote
description: Copilot brings GPT-4 and more context to Microsoft OneNote to automate your organization and note-taking.

title: Data of 30 million WordPress users leaked by top cloud accounting firm
description: A Canadian cloud unicorn leaves database with sensitive data unattended.

title: Apple just patched a pair of dangerous iOS and macOS security issues, so update now
description: Two zero-days were found exploited in the wild, possibly by government-sponsored attackers.

title: Western Digital outage finally appears to have a fix - but you won't be totally pleased
description: Major cloud outage remains unfixed; Western Digital tells NAS users to enable local access for now.

title: Google's latest Android security update fixes some worrying flaws
description: Three Android security flaws were addressed, including one allegedly being abused in the wild.

title: MSI confirms data breach following ransomware attack
description: Criminal group reportedly asks for $4 million in exchange for stolen MSI data.

title: 7 ways ChatGPT is already being used as an everyday cheat code
description: Here are seven real-world ChatGPT examples that show how the AI chatbot is changing our lives for better and worse.

title: New Google Pixel 7a image leaks show off the phone in three colors
description: What appear to be official photos of the Google Pixel 7a have made their way online, showing off its design.

title: Microsoft fined millions for selling software to Russian firms
description: Over $12 million in banned sales, including over 1,200 in Russia, has landed Microsoft with a $3 million punishment.

title: Over three quarters of tech workers aren't happy with their job
description: New report finds flexible working and company culture mean the difference between workers staying or quitting.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Monday, April 10 (game #441)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Exclusive - almost 40% of US adult web users have used a generative AI tool
description: ChatGPT, Dall-E, Stable Diffusion, Midjourney, Bing Chat, Night Cafe and Bard all prove popular.
